TopicTitle: "center of lift" doesn't work with FAR?

Articles.Content:
Hello - so does ferram aero space disable the "center of lift" feature? Because it doesn't work with it ... I disabled mods one by one and after finally deleting FAR it worked again.

Would be a shame if that was the case ... I had problems setting up FAR in the first place (the first time I tried it just did nothing, now I got the ingame icon and it definitely makes things explode so it did something ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) ) and now this ... halp plx

cheers

edit: to clarify, this is talking about the feature in the vehicle assembly bay and spacehangar equivalent

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-20T14:57:11Z" title="06/20/2015 02:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 20, 2015</time> by SoWeMeetAgain**

I have no idea why but it works now ... I just started KSP up today, decided to make a screenshot, and it works. And suddenly my planes fly again (they were sticking to the surface of the runway yesterday), too.

So it seems restarting KSP solved it :/
You shouldn't use it anyway as it's usually inaccurate. Use the numbers and graphs instead.
